title: League of Legends Updated launcher sound tear
body: Hello after updating to the latest patch today, the new launcher started playing the sounds as if the files can't be read propertly, it sounds like the way it would sound trying to listen to music from a scratched dvd, idk what causes it, but i'm on windows 10, 64 bit version if that helps

replies.body: Wow, that's pretty interesting!  I hope it doesn't sound too jarring, maybe nostalgic if anything.  I recommend reporting this over to the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards for testing.  In the meantime, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)may be necessary in case installation went poorly and ended up in corrupt files.  Thanks for testing!
